籤詩版本二:
Ukujikeleza, ukuvala iingozi ezininzi, ukuthwala amanzi kunye nokutsala abantu ukuba banyuke iintaba
Ndide ndikhangele kwelinye ilizwe ukuze ndifumane uncedo, yaye andizange ndibuye emva kokuhamba umgama ongamawaka eekhilomitha.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nokurhuqa udaka namanzi.
Ukugcina izinto ezindala kuya kuzisa amathamsanqa.
解曰: Ukuhlehla kunokwenzeka. Inkqubela inzima. Yiba nje ngononophelo. Musa ukulindela ukunyuka phezulu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kunzima kuQiuniang ukuhamba
U-Du Qiu wayeyinzalelwane yaseJinling kwi-Tang Dynasty.
Kwiminyaka eyi-15, waba lishweshwe lika-Li Qi (umngcatshi kwi-Tang Dynasty).
Ngomnyaka wesibini weYuanhe (807), uLi Qi uqalise ngokusemthethweni umkhosi wokuvukela. Kamva, imvukelo kaLi Qi ayizange iphumelele kwaye uDu Qiu wabandakanywa kwibhotwe. Kamva, wayethandwa nguMlawuli uXianzong weTang Dynasty waza waba lishweshwe.
Ngomnyaka weshumi elinesihlanu kaYuanhe (820), uTang Muzong wafika etroneni waza wammisela njengonyana wakhe u-Li Min's Fumu (umntwana oyingcali ekunyamekeleni abantwana bentsapho yasebukhosini).
Kamva, uLi Min wagxothwa njengoKumkani waseZhang, kwaye uDu Qiuci wabuyela kwidolophu yakhe.
Xa uDu Mu edlula ngaseJinling, wambona ehlwempuzekile kwaye emdala...
(Eli bali lisisafobe sokuzisola ngokuba izinto ziba mandundu ngalo lonke ixesha.)
聖意: Umzi awuzithandi, uthandazela ubutyebi, ithamsanqa ekwindla nasebusika, umtshato ogudileyo, uthandazela iintsikelelo zikaLiujia, uthandazela iintsikelelo zabahambi ngeenyawo, uvale amasimi, iintshulube zesilika, awukho mhle kwimfuyo emithandathu, kunzima ukufumana abantu, ukumangalelana, ukulahlekelwa ngamathamsanqa, ukulahlekelwa yimpahla, ukugula, nobutyebi obungeyomfuneko kumangcwaba asezintabeni.
